title: Inheriting Billions After Being Retrenched - Novel Updates
author: Rice Rookie
description:
'…Did I see wrong? That Luo Qiao, the same Luo Qiao who was trying to throw herself at the top celebrity… is actually the daughter of the wealthy Luo family? Have I gone insane or is this world insane?' 

'The pampered daughter of the Luo Corporation? Are you talking about the Luo Corporation, the same Luo Corporation with assets in the hundreds of billions? The boss actually has a daughter and it's Luo Qiao?' 

'Exactly! So what if she's fair, rich and pretty? Even so, have you forgotten that she tried to seduce a top celebrity? In the end, she's still a fair, rich and pretty girl who is cheap as hell! That's shameless, shameless, shameless, shameless!' 

Luo Qiao has been in the entertainment circle for only a year before she shot to fame. About three months ago, there was a sudden exposé of her entering the room of a top celebrity and not leaving till the early hours of the morning. It spells the end of her career as a rising female star. Following this, she falls into a depression, until... 

'I've decided,' Luo Qiao purses her lips and says with much difficulty, 'To return and inherit the family fortune.”>
